hero.description: +2 years of experience. Systems Engineer specialized in developing unique web applications.

items.title: Webmaster & Infrastructure Administrator
items.description: Responsible for managing and administering WordPress-based websites. Server maintenance and organizational infrastructure management (Google Workspace). Implementation of security improvements and web performance optimization.

items.title: Marketing Specialist
items.description: Development and implementation of digital marketing strategies to increase company visibility and reach. Management of advertising campaigns on social media and digital platforms. Metrics analysis and content optimization to improve audience engagement.

items.title: Ges2l — Modular management platform
items.description: Modular platform to manage institutions, sports, budgets and more. Private monolith in production with PERN stack (Postgres, Express, React, Node), Vite apps, Astro landing page; validation with Zod, ORM with Sequelize, linters/formatting with ESLint + Prettier and custom CSS for styles.

items.title: Arduino Control Web — PWA for ESP32
items.description: Web interface to control an ESP32 via WebSockets. Network optimizations for low latency, Access Point mode and UX focus for real-time control.

items.title: Cuello.dev — Personal portfolio
items.description: Personal site built with Astro and Tailwind, optimized for performance, accessibility and smooth animations.

paragraphs: I'm Andrés, a web developer in training and passionate about creating practical and well-built digital products. I started programming at a young age out of curiosity, and over time that exploration became my professional path.

I currently manage and optimize several websites for the same company, where I have worked on performance, security, SEO and automation of editorial workflows. I'm also focusing on becoming a modern full stack developer with JavaScript.
In parallel, I build personal projects —like Ges2l— that allow me to learn current technologies, explore architectures, and improve my skills to offer real and scalable solutions.
My goal is to establish myself as a full stack developer and continue creating projects that bring value to users and companies.

404.title: 404 — Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist
404.message: Sorry — the page you are looking for was not found.
404.submessage: The URL may be wrong or the page no longer exists.
404.helpText: If you think this is an error, please contact us and copy the URL.

meta.title: Andrés's Portfolio | Full Stack Web Developer
meta.description: Systems Engineer with 2+ years of experience. Building unique, fast, and scalable web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js.
meta.ogTitle: Andrés Cuello - Full Stack Web Developer
meta.ogDescription: Full stack developer specialized in the PERN stack and in building ultra-fast sites with Astro. Experienced in creating modern web applications using JavaScript and React.
meta.author: Andrés David Cuello Acosta
